title: Willa Wicked
description: A witty and inspiring story about that first crush in a world of witches and magic.  Your magic is not a toy. It is not for cleaning your room. It is not for impressing your friends. These are the rules Willa lives by, until she meets the tragically suicidal Henry. On first glance, the plain red-head at school seems shy and unapproachable, but Willa soon lifts that protective front and finds something much darker Henry was not born of this world. He was stolen from inside a book by a sorceress. And he longs to return. Henry had never fit in with anyone before, but with a little help from his new friend Willa, and a little magic, he starts to feel like he belongs. Until a tragic encounter with the sorceress destroys everything, and Henry vanishes. Heartbroken, Willa is left with nothing but Did Henry finally go back into his book, or did his evil surrogate do something unthinkable to him? And the most burning question of Will she ever see Henry again?
author: Angela M. Hudson
